website_summaries.verdict: Offers many of the same ingredients and benefits for a lower price.
pros: Uses hyaluronic acid to increase skin's hydration
Instant absorption means you can wear it under makeup without a greasy feeling
cons: Users sensitive to fragrance will notice a "perfumy" scent

customer_reviews.title: Use this with other Nutrogena Hydroboost products for best results
customer_reviews.text: First I want to say, I've had horribly dry flaky skin on my face for three years (since my daughter was born). I've wasted so much money on products that do nothing. I was surprised when I tried this and it worked. I originally only tried the water gel and wasn't satisfied. But after I bought all 4 products - toner, serum, eye cream and water gel - and use them all together, my skin is in great shape. Very hydrated and soft. I'm extremely pleased, but I wanted to advise others to use as a set instead of just individual products and you'll have better results.
customer_reviews.author: steve3

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job...
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist suggest I stop paying premium price for "high end" skin care products and switch to the Neutrogena brand. He was right. This serum has taken care of my dry skin and balanced out the oily areas. It's not greasy at all. Now I've switched to the Neutrogena brand for all skin care, hair care and make-up. Costs a lot less and is a better product. This serum is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this serum ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST facial serum I have ever used & I have tried many. Always disappointed. Look no further because, IT WORKS....period! I was buying a box of tiny vials from "another" face product website, for 4 x's the price. Never again. This is it. Use it with the Neutrogena eye gel, and your face will be transformed in days. Morning and at bedtime and I have noticed the most change, around my eyes. It takes years off and no more bags or dark circles. Say goodbye to those fine lines and tired look,
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Low active ingredient
customer_reviews.text: The active ingredient is so far down the ingredient list its barely in there. You can get a more pure and organic version for less $$
customer_reviews.author: k9882

customer_reviews.title: Top 3 faves. But $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this product! I use it as a moisturizer alone. I love the smell (a light cherry scent) and the ease of applying it. Also good for sensitive skin. I only gave it 4 stars because of the price. This is way too expensive for a drug store product, when Clinique has a huge bottle of moisturizing gel for only $28 and it's 4x the size of this. And it works the same. But if price isn't an issue, this stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: my complaint is that I don't like how they feel or smell
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of serums. Usually, my complaint is that I don't like how they feel or smell. They all seem to perform the same, so this one makes the cut based on the two characters that I mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: petunia

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering perfume caused headache
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on my face and had to wash it off immediately because the fragrance was overpowering and unpleasant. Even after I washed it off, the fragrance lingered and gave me a headache. I thought it would be ok to use on the backs of my hands and knuckles for very dry skin, but even on my hands the fragrance was too strong and still gave me a headache. I am sensitive to fragrance, so that is part of the problem, but no facial product should have that strong a perfume (especially a clinging, artificial one). I was very disappointed because the Unscented Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream is very good.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin
customer_reviews.text: I use two drops of this serum morning and night and my skin feels so soft. It is moisturizing and a little goes a long way. I am glad I have it set up on S&S delivery.
customer_reviews.author: smilin29

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have adult acne, so finding something that doesn't break me out is hard. This glides on smoothly. One pump will cover your face and neck. I gave the scent three stars only because I prefer products unscented. The scent is light though and not offensive. My dermatologist recommends applying in this order: wash your face, toner, serums, medicated creams, hyaluronic acid, moisturizer and finally sunscreen. Make sure to let each product absorb into your skin before applying another. Your skin can only absorb so much at a time, so do not rush the application or you will not see results you want. For nightime routine, skip the sunscreen but still follow the steps in order.
customer_reviews.author: Gummi Mummi

customer_reviews.title: They're the best skin care products I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I got dry flaky skin after I started using proactive this past winter, but I didn't want to stop because it was fighting my acne more than anything I'd ever used. I knew I just had to find something strong enough to moisturize through the dry period and nothing worked except for this and neutrogena water gel. They're the best skin care products I've ever used! I use the water gel under my moisturizer in the morning and this under moisturizer at night and they've both done wonders. I hope neutrogena never stops making these two products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped for the best because of the great reviews but, this made my chin breakout horribly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Nope! This is not for sensitive skin! I love the scent for their body lotion, but for their face serum? No, they should have definitely made this unscented. I was really looking forward to trying this and really hopeful that it would work. I was previously using another hyaluronic serum and ran out so I tried this. After a couple days of using this, my skin had a negative reaction. Likely because of the scent. It’s not as liquidy as my other hyaluronic serum either. This is more like a gel/cream. Not returning it because it’s more trouble than it’s worth, but giving it to someone else who may like it because it doesn’t work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but between the very strong fragrance and the fact that my face is more dry now than before... I just don't. It does have a nice texture when applied, but overall I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CassieNik

customer_reviews.title: Give This A Try!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend not only this product, the the entire Hydro Boost line. I have very pale, very dry skin. I live in the north with long, cold winters and have always had issues with flaking, dry skin. I’ve used the richest, heaviest of creams and nothing has worked as well as this serum. No flaking, it doesn’t feel dry and my skin doesn’t feel like it’s going to crack when I wash it. It’s even given me a healthy glow! Which, let’s face it, is always the goal! As a side note, I’ve been pairing this serum with the Hydro Boost SPF 50 lotion. Together, they make my skin feel and look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McManus

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a product for sensitive skin for a 45 year old. This is great, moisturizes well, doesn't make me break out, does not sting or irritate skin and has no smell.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin, beware!
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up, it smelled great! But broke me out in a huge rash.
customer_reviews.author: E. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer. I use this plus the night cream. It makes my face feel very smooth and soft. I also put it in over a vitamin C serum sometimes. It takes very little and spreads easily. Can also be used around eyes. I am 64 years old and this is my new go-to!
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Not Ethical
customer_reviews.text: I love this HydroBoost line. It is very moisturizing and doesn't leave your skin feeling sticky or tacky. The scent is great and almost makes the product feel luxurious. My only gripe is that Neutrogena does animal testing in some countries and I don't agree with that. I wish they would end all animal testing as you don't need to in order to make a fantastic product. I would not recommend for that reason. If you want a great moisturizer without paying a large premium this would be a good option though. I won't use this companies products again but that doesn't take away how good their products are for dry, sensitive and oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Worked Okay, Smelled Awful
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is light, and worked okay, but not as well as other products I have tried in the past. I could have lived with that, but the perfume/fragrance they use for this lotion is absolutely terrible. It smells strong and it smells awful, like your grandmother's perfume that's gone off. I try to never throw away purchases if I can help it (waste not want not), but this was a product that I just couldn't stand. I considered using it only on my legs, away from my face so I could avoid the smell....but I decided I never wanted to smell it again at all! Into the bin it went.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: I combine this with my daily spf and it goes ...
customer_reviews.text: I combine this with my daily spf and it goes on smooth and helps my skin feel more moist and plush! This is my second jar and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this works on my skin! I have very combination skin that gets greasier in the summer and dryer in the winter. It makes my skin feel so great without leaving a heavy feeling. This has been the only moisturizer that works in the summer for me. Ill using it in combination with the hyrdo face lotion in the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica follin

customer_reviews.title: Made my face breakout
customer_reviews.text: I love the hydro moisturizer and use it daily but the serum makes me break out. I tried to replace my Keihls hydro plump serum with this, but it’s not comparable.
customer_reviews.author: gatorgirl151688

customer_reviews.title: Really good daily serum
customer_reviews.text: I love it, the texture is soft and light. I am 55 years old and have combination skin. This serum leaves my skin hydrated and soft, it easily glides on, and it is absorbed quickly. Very few creams or serums through out my life I have like as much as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Maria L. Abaunza

customer_reviews.title: Very good ! Love it second bottle
customer_reviews.text: Second one I buy and I absolutely love it! I use African soap for my acne so it dries my skin and this hydrates my face over night and I wake up with super smooth skin! I highly recommend love it
customer_reviews.author: Sk8 Mamii

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t feel like it made my skin any more hydrated. My face is so dry right now that it’s actually peeling all over. I use moisturizer three times a day and I’m very picky about my products. I thought this would help but it didn’t. And it also has fragrance which is terrible for sensitive skin like mine. I tried it for about 2weeks to give it a fair shot and I saw my breakouts increase. Once I stopped using, the zits went away. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Abby D.

customer_reviews.title: Great serum!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact. Pump works great and the product is definitely helping to moisturize my face after a week of using. The serum is viscous enough to apply easily to the face without dripping and is scentless. Only con: the clear cap does not sit tight onto the bottle and is constantly falling off. I've thrown the cap away because it's so cumbersome to have it keep tipping off at the slightest movement.
customer_reviews.author: MikiTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Must have in my routine
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good things about this line! I come from a luxury skincare background and nothing has helped my dry skin like the hydro boost line! I use it all and this was one of my favorites! Great for super dry skin. Smells nice, absorbs quickly and layers well under makeup and moisturizer. Follow me on IG for more amazon finds and reviews justbeautyjule
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: A leading fashion magazine rated this serum as good as serums 4 times the cost...so I bought it. In less than a week of use I noticed an improvement in fine lines by over 50%! I have nothing to gain by saying this, it’s my truth.
customer_reviews.author: Beach dweller

customer_reviews.title: Works for me not for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Worked for me not for my husband. Wish there was a Easy way to determine if it will work with certain skin type despite of their description which is ever accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Saj P.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Oh my word! If you’re looking for a lightweight hydrating serum that helps hide those fine lines and gives your skin a glow boost, look no farther!!!! I love this serum. It’s so lightweight, absorbs quickly AND it is thee best serum I’ve used after a chemical peel! I switch my skin routines up every month but I’m always going to make sure I have this around.
customer_reviews.author: TesiaJulse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glow/3 week review
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought 12-31-19. First use 1-3-20 I noticed the difference just today, I had a double take in the mirror and smiled...it’s working. Next I followed it up by asking my husband if he notices a difference, w/honesty. He says “Yes, your skin is brighter and clearer”. —-The specific end result I was hoping for😌 Ps. I’ve also used Superfood facial scrub for the same amount of time. For me, a 40 year old Black woman, I’ve now found my new beauty regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Browneyesparrow

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite skin products. I don’t use a lot on my skin, so I need key products that have big effects. This makes my skin noticeably softer and more hydrated. Not much of a scent which works good for me. You only need a relatively small amount but I do wish the size was bigger. Also takes a while to dispense that small amount you need which can be a touch annoying.
customer_reviews.author: nicb

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena hyaluronic acid serum
customer_reviews.text: Love using hyaluronic acid serum. I pair this with my skin medica ha5 . Works great honestly give it some time and see how your skin can be more refreshed looking . Not saying it is going to make you look 20 again but I am 40 and have great skin regimens that include this ingredient. Plus Neutrogena is a great brand .
customer_reviews.author: Making it happen

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Exact same product that's in the store. I've been using this and other related products for a couple of years and I love how it makes my skin feel. I use it pre-makeup (before primer) and in the evening after my face is clean. I have combination skin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate J.

customer_reviews.title: Strong artificial scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent was too strong. Product is lightweight and good for summer. Moisturizing capacity is comparable to putting pure aloe vera on your face. I tried to use this as a summer moisturizer before my Bioré sunscreen but it had a reaction with my sunscreen and gave me a rash. It is good as a serum if you can handle the strong scent.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: wish it wasnt fragranced
customer_reviews.text: I use this with damp skin as directed by my dermatologist ( when using HAs), however I wish it wasnt scented. Added fragrance is irritating to the skin and has no place in skincare. I really like the pump and have had really nice plump skin in the morning with no dryness! (for reference I am on a retinal acne medication)
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Smells good. The cap keeps falling off doe. Edit: So I started watching Hyram on youtube (skincare expert) and he is really against fragrance as it is bad in the long run. And I noticed that this is a light serum, personally, it's not good for dry skin but good for my oily days (I have combo skin). I don't think it's so bad to stop using it but I won't repurchase. I'll probably use it for my body as that skin is less sensitive. ALSO I just lost the cap. so yeah. :)
customer_reviews.author: Beep Beep I’m a Sheep

customer_reviews.title: Best hydrating serum
customer_reviews.text: Love this serum! This serum is recommended by dermatologists, so I gave it a try and this is a great yet affordable hydrating serum out there. I follow a routine of washing my face with my Cetaphil cleanser, Thayer rose essence facial toner, TruSkin Vitamin C serum, Hydro Boost Hydrating serum, L'oreal eye cream, and Cetaphil facial lotion. I suffered from acne but I cannot use Benzoyl Peroxide or Salicylic Acid as they are too harsh for my skin and this routine has been helping me in clearing my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Yeap

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! I have 3 bottles stocked up because it is the only thing I can really use every day morning and night that will not break me out and I actually see a difference 😊 I hope they never change what theyre doing because I will keep purchasing! Also I made this review for the girl who is like myself and fights acne, oiliness, dryness and irritation. This is super soothing and hydrating. Your face will thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and breathable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer. There is plenty in the bottle and now that I have 3 I won’t need to reorder again anytime soon. It goes on very light and is easily absorbable. I don’t have sensitive skin so I can’t judge on its work there but it leaves my skin feeling dewy and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Altenburger

customer_reviews.title: Not as hydrating and beware if sensitive!
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this product. I have rather sensitive skin but it could be worse. This product breaks me out horribly. I get pimples from it or small bumps all over my face. Happens only when I use this product. Also, I don’t feel like it hydrated nearly as much as it should. I’ve tried other more expensive serums with HA in it and they tend to work better than this one. You get what you pay for. I won’t be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Fragranced
customer_reviews.text: This formula is just alright. I'm disappointed that fragrance was added and it doesn't even smell very nice. I don't have sensitive skin but it felt like it irritated me. I returned this
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Whoops
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my skin reacted horribly to these products. They did feel somewhat hydrating, but my skin started getting little red dots all over the place. No acne, just these red dots and bumps... I've tried many skin products, but this is the only line to ever do this.
customer_reviews.author: Sel

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a hydrating serum to compliment my skin care routine and this is a winner for a combination skin. I use this every morning before my moisturizer and sunscreen and there has been a visible difference to my skin. It feels very soft and glows constantly and I can just go about reapplying my sunscreen. I also use it sometimes at night when I'm not using any other treatment on my skin (retinol or lactic acid). It's great value for money and by using just 3 pumps for my face and entire neck, it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Good but there was not a lot of product 😕
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but i don’t think that they fill up the bottle. I only use it for about two or three weeks? My estee lauder ANR sample bottle last for a month. Maybe i pumped it too much? I don’t know. But i agree it is expensive for the little product you get.
customer_reviews.author: luthfi adam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I love all their products! Non greasy formula
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, light scented
customer_reviews.text: It is good for what you pay for. Well hydrating, light weight, non greasy. I only doubt on it’s ability to maintain the skin hydrated. It has a scent, which I don’t like, not because it smells bad, just because I don’t like scented products to put on my skin. Overall it is quite good for the price. I will be moving on to buying something else for me and give this one to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Maci

customer_reviews.title: Must have for skincare at all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Reccommended by my dermatologist this is part of my daily skin care routine and my face is healthier for it. Super mosturising non sticky, stays. Great for under base or primer. No scent
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Best skin serum
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It gets dead skin off and the scent is light. I already bought a second one and set up auto reoccurring shipments to save $ since I'll definitely keep ordering this. Using daily sometimes twice daily, it lasts about a month to a month and a half. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: cheap watered down moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Tried it due to reviews. It may have been a good product before they diluted it by 50% or more. It is watery as hell. Was using Riversol which is an amazing product and then used this and was very ineffective. I mean it is better than using nothing but not much.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Youthful glow that lasts
customer_reviews.text: If you are in a budget and want a hyuralonic serum, I'd try this one. It makes my face shine, but not too much. I can feel the moisture and it lasts all day. I use this along with other Anti-aging products (with retinol) and my face stays soft, glowing, and youthful.
customer_reviews.author: julie russell

customer_reviews.title: scented irritated face
customer_reviews.text: This is scented and irritated my face but it does make your skin smooth. Disappointed I can not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia ONeill

customer_reviews.title: Great moisture boost
customer_reviews.text: Best thing for my dry face. Slight smell but dissipates quickly. (They need to make these products fragrance free). Other than that wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: feels great
customer_reviews.text: My skin is not sensitive necessarily but is prone to some breakouts. This is very lightweight, but I don't feel like I'm missing moisture if I wear it alone or with a toning spray. It absorbs quickly, I don't ever feel like it peels like some other products I have used. It layers well under other products and makeup. Nice light scent and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie J Kirkham

customer_reviews.title: Great price for hyaluronic acid, works, smells good
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light weight moisturizer, you may need a heavier cream on top of super dry spots. My last moisturizer made me sweat really bad, this does not make you sweat and I love it for hot, humid days. The scent is light and pleasant, this is great for really hot climates and under other creams. I recommend this product if you know exactly what your skin needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lockart-Albertson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Literally my favorite serum smells amazing and it goes well on my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Anaycha Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to Moisturizer for Even Softer Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have really dry skin and this works wonders when paired with the other Hydroboost moisturizer. I was scared it was going to be greasy but it wasn't greasy at all! It actually goes on really smooth and then dries very clean. I really like using it under my eyes too as it makes them soft and plump without feeling heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizers often make me break out but this one didn’t! I have a fairly simple routine - cleanse, tone & moisturize. I can definitely feel and see the difference the hyaluronic acid is making in smoothness and firmness. My only complaint is the scent isn’t my favorite, but that’s just a personal preference. I can’t really think of anything to compare it to for reference. Still a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Serum for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum and put it on under my olay micro sculpting cream for added moisture. It goes on smooth and blends in quickly. If you have dry skin this combo works well. At night I wear the serum with the hydra boost extra dry skin and it really does work.
customer_reviews.author: barby

customer_reviews.title: Great serum!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this serum to go with my updated new skin routine and it is a great addition! Its very smooth and soft feeling and it feels hydrating when applying on my skin and I love that. I also have the hydro boost shield spray by neutrogena and they go great together.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my skin plump & moisturized longer!
customer_reviews.text: I apply the Hydro Boost serum on wet skin (face & neck after washing) then apply the Hydro Boost gel as well. I feel that my skin stays plump and moisturized longer when I use the serum. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, i love the smell and very good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Gaetane

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing without clogged pores.
customer_reviews.text: Like the product. Helped me with my dry skin after delivery a child. Usually I have oily skin, but you know this hormone changing after childbirth...So, I wanted smth to help me with drying, but didn't clog pores. I think this stuff did a good job!
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin look younger
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this, I see a change in my skin after one week.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great product
customer_reviews.text: My skin has been soooo dry and this product has good reviews so I gave it a shot and I’m so glad I did. I don’t love the scent (it’s not awful but I just don’t like fragrance in any face products) but wow my skin has turned around in like a week’s time. Definitely recommend it. I also use the moisturizer and love it, too.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!!:)
customer_reviews.text: Nice light scent. Tiny amount does face and neck. Goes on smoothly and dries without any stickiness or residue. Feels nice on the skin and doesn't irritate! My skin is really sensitive so saying it doesn't irritate is really an endorsement for all us sensitive skin gals. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Potentially not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while now. It helps save my face from peeling in the winter. It’s my first time buying from amazon and it’s not the right consistency or scent I’m really sus about this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good to use for those with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my face and neck. I was nervous at first due to the sensitivity of my face. But so far no reactions to the usage. Love the way my face feels and looks. Would use again.
customer_reviews.author: Nordeen L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful in skin regimen
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Does very well in my skin routine and helps my skin absorb my other products. I do the Korean skincare routine and those products get pricey. This is probably the best substitute for Korean boosters. And I mean as actual korean serum booster definition. Does not leave my skin feeling dry even though there is alcohol in it. Subtle pleasant scent. Gives my face a boost in brightening, smoothing, and feels like my skin 15 years ago. Love
customer_reviews.author: J. Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this entire line....I only wish the bottle was larger...if you use this as a serum for both morning and night...it does not seem to last a long time. I decided to only use for daytime to help make it last. Feels fabulous on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Raleighwood

customer_reviews.title: Added moisture just like it said it would.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Neurogena Hydro Boost. My face felt soft and really hydrated, it's not greasy, and not to heavy. I have sensitive and dry skin and I had no problem with it. I will buy again. I recommend this for any skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Arnita Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena is probably one of the best product for anti-ageing
customer_reviews.text: I love Neutrogena... as a 63 year old you need to put moisture back into your skin ... and this product performs beautifully and it not very expensive
customer_reviews.author: MHB

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite in this line of product
customer_reviews.text: I love the gel wash and refer moisturizing gel. This was expensive and if I had tossed it when it quit pumping I feel like I'd have wasted most of it. As I said I love the other products, but this left me oily by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Scent is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love how light weight and not greasy this product line is. And of course, the scent is amazing. Absorbs right into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: KLL

customer_reviews.title: Highly fragranced
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, I just can't get past the fragrance. It has a very strong smell - almost like laundry detergent. I do like the way it feels on my face when I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: elizfbp

customer_reviews.title: No difference.
customer_reviews.text: Notice no difference at all. My natural products work better. This doesn’t do anything remotely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin I break out with almost every new face product I use - except for this one! The smell is amazing I use this after cleansing my face with the hydro boost cleanser. No breakouts, my skin isn’t oily like it use to be, recommend to anyone with trouble/oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nati

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry sensitive skin!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn’t bother my sensitive skin, make my face feel moisturized all day, and smells clean! I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Magical
customer_reviews.text: The way your face feels when you apply this is just amazing. Your face feels hydrated and you feel like you are glowing. Would definitely recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Blueberry

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: $3 cheaper than CVS! This is a very nice, lightweight moisturizer!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Skin loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My skin soaks this up right away, with no feeling of residue or greasiness. Two pumps was enough. Didn't make my skin oily throughout the day. Recently switched to a face lotion from Lush because I'm trying to cut down on my plastic waste. It had nothing to do with the product, because I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fighting the dry winter months
customer_reviews.text: It smells good and feels good on my skin. I was told it would make my skin look amazing. I’m not sure I’ve seen much of a difference but I enjoy using it during these winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I recieved a USED product!! Not only was it used it was sent to me with the seal BROKEN on the box and a dirty nasty top that was NOT the original top (because it didn’t fit the bottle) and I’ve purchased this item from the store before and I know how it’s supposed to look! I’m pissed that I was sent this faulty product!
customer_reviews.author: Mooka Mix

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this moisturizer. It’s very different than others I have used. But very effective. Leaves my skin feeling very hydrated while not a bit of that greasy feeling. And this has a very nice scent!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene C. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent facial moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent moisturizer with anti-aging benefits. My dermatologist actually suggested this and it’s great. I mix it with my retin-A so that my face doesn’t dry out.
customer_reviews.author: MOVIE GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Hydro boost
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I had dry patches on my cheeks that I could not get rid of. If I found a moisturizer that worked, I broke out. So I grabbed this on a whim. I'm so glad I did. I've used it morning and night, I don't have that oily feeling on my skin, I'm not breaking out. Definitely will be keeping in my normal skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and light, absorbs right in
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice and silky and absorbs in like it was water! Doesn’t leave you feeling like you have lotion on your face
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Unscented. I use this for my morning daily moisturizer along with retinol oil at night. I have sensitive skin and it works well. My high school daughter is using it now too.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tansel

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a serum so bad and decided to try this and I’m must say I’m happy I did. It’s very lightweight and doesn’t make your face oily. It’s not mattifying but it’s very soothing. I mix this serum with tea tree oil or niacinamide sometimes. I would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Sherkay

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Soft
customer_reviews.text: So far so good ! After using the cleanser my face feels soft, not dry like sone cleansers leave your skin. There's a nice sent, not strong at all. My first week in and I give it 5 Stars !
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Burns acne-prone skin
customer_reviews.text: I have acne-prone dry skin and got this with the hopes it could help my skin stay hydrated in the morning, after using my acne medication at night. Unfortunately, this product stings and burns really intensely on my face. I assume that it is the added fragrance, which smells kind of like cherry. It is a pleasant smell but I do wish Neutrogena would use less irritating perfumes in their skincare lines.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it does much. Leaves a bit of a tacky residue
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Overhyped
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t use this line for sensitive skin. This product doesn’t make me react as much as the face wash.
customer_reviews.author: gembabe1

customer_reviews.title: Trying it out
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an alternative to Clinique moisturizer. My face feels tight after using but it isn’t that much of an issue. Since the dryer months are approaching where I live (I reside in a very humid, southern location) I am interested in seeing how it’ll hold up. I’ve been using it for about 2 months now. 3 stars since I’m not sure if it’ll work well during the cooler/dryer months or not.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully hydrated skin
customer_reviews.text: Cannot live without. Never could use moisturizer.. I broke out every time. Not with this.. ever. Beautiful and soft, well hydrated skin.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Many Paths

customer_reviews.title: What's supposed to be happening?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it. I don't see a difference in wrinkles or skin texture or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Marino Michielsen

customer_reviews.title: great serum
customer_reviews.text: this is the third time i've bought this - the scent and texture is great. feels so lovely on your skin
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alfieri

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love how this stuff feels and smells! Made my wind burn go away in a day which was everything!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: It's like patting a cool layer of fresh dew into your skin. go for it, you'll love it. the price can't be beat, considering you can pay upwards of $100 for the fancy stuff. Not everyone will like that this is a scented product but I like the pretty smell, fresh and floral. My skin looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It helps keep my face hydrated all day (along with the Neutrogena toner and the Aveeno moisturizer).
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum, Oil-Free and Non-Comedogenic Face Serum Formula for Glowing Complexion, Oil-Free & Non-Comedogenic, 1 fl. oz
product_meta.description: Achieve glowing skin day after day with Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum. Addressing dryness to deliver hydration, this facial serum formula contains hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin, attracts moisture and locks it in. The unique hydrating face serum formula helps you achieve a fully hydrated complexion that stays smooth and supple and glows from within. Complete your at-home skincare routine with this oil-free, non-comedogenic gentle serum and pair with other products from the Neutrogena Hydro Boost collection which includes hydrating Hand Cream, Body Gel Cream, Facial Moisturizers and Cleansers.
feature_bullets: 1-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum to deliver higher hydration levels for skin that glows day after day
Unique face serum formula helps you achieve a fully hydrated complexion that stay smooth, supple, and glows from within
Hyaluronic acid serum absorbs quickly to quench skin and addresses the root cause of dryness to deliver hydration

Complete your at-home skincare routine with this oil-free facial serum and pair with other products from the Neutrogena Hydro Boost collection which includes hydrating Hand Cream, Body Gel Cream, Facial Moisturizers and Cleansers
Contains hyaluronic acid, a hydrator found naturally in the skin, attracts moisture and locks it in Plus, the gentle hydrating formula is both oil-free and non-comedogenic, so it won't clog pores

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
